articles.title: Asian stocks retreat amid US, China CPI jitters - Investing.com
articles.description: Asian stocks retreat amid US, China CPI jitters
articles.content: Investing.com-- Most Asian stocks fell on Thursday, tracking overnight declines on Wall Street after hotter-than-expected U.S. inflation eroded bets on early interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve… [+2441 chars]

articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Asian Development Bank raises India's GDP growth forecast for FY25 to 7% on robust investment, consumer demand | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The 2024-25 growth estimate is, however, lower than 7.6 per cent projected for the 2022-23 fiscal. Strong investment drove GDP growth in the 2022-23 fiscal as consumption was muted, the ADB said.
articles.content: The Asian Development Bank (ADB) has revised its GDP growth forecast for India, raising it to 7% for the current fiscal year (2023-24) from its previous projection of 6.7%. According to the ADB's Apr… [+2267 chars]
